title: Squishing blood stem cells could facilitate harvest for transplants

title_detail.value: Squishing blood stem cells could facilitate harvest for transplants

summary: How deformable cells are, and thus how stiff or squishy they are, plays an important role in retaining blood-forming stem cells in their marrow niches and thus preserving their long-term repopulation capabilities.

summary_detail.value: How deformable cells are, and thus how stiff or squishy they are, plays an important role in retaining blood-forming stem cells in their marrow niches and thus preserving their long-term repopulation capabilities.
